t: Ironbridge Acquires Gardner | Walker Glass
s: January 19, 2024 - Like Walker, Gardner has a proud history of growth and innovation based on solid core values. Founded in 1962, Gardner Glass Products started as a mirror manufacturer. Over the years, Gardner expanded its product offering to include a variety of decorative glass products under its Dreamwalls brand.
